ygData.subject: RE: (OT) LARP - (was: Re: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! ! )
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry bout the off topic...that my last as well, err..at least for now. Never say never, you know...hehe.  :) I haven t been to Gfay in ages now... I m soon
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry bout the off topic...that my last as well, err..at least for now.
Never say never, you know...hehe. :)

I haven't been to Gfay in ages now...

I'm soon going to hit 32, at which point I hope to be able to find groups in
LGuk in the Assassin room.

Regardless of how "easy" it is, I've never been able to get that mask.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: JESSICA_WEBBER@... [mailto:JESSICA_WEBBER@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 4:34 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: (OT) LARP - (was: Re: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! ! )



Ah yes, the elliptic lenticular cylinder in Hartford: first two-sided
office building in the world. But I'm not there. I'm in their other great
archetectural experiment: the leaking outdated sh*thole just a few miles
north. :-)

Speaking of crappy places to work, can you image being a vendor in
Kelethin? I mean, the constant shouting in the zone would be deafening,
and playing shoots & ladders everyday just to get to your booth has to be a
royal pain in the rear. I think I'd rather sell poison in Dagnor's.

Peace
Evulia, ODing on caffiene at the moment, sorry. ;^)





Christopher Sanders

<christopher.sanders@exp To:
"'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'"
erian.com> <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>

cc:

04/30/2001 04:11 PM Subject: RE: (OT)
LARP - (was: Re:
Please respond to [eqbards] Attn: Virus
Warning ! ! ! )
eqbards









Just for giggles, I checked out phl.com. :) That's one funky office
building!!

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: JESSICA_WEBBER@... [mailto:JESSICA_WEBBER@...]
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 3:58 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: (OT) LARP - (was: Re: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! ! )



If you don't mind my asking, where in the world are these
strangely-dressed, foam-weilding friends of yours holding such an event?

Peace
Evulia, who didn't realize she'd been playing a LARP everytime she through
a foam brick at the guy across the aisle. Oh wait, we only have corporate
costumes on. :-)






Talies the

>Action
>Role

Exactly, and in this case, the LARP that I play includes dressing up in
medieval costumes, and swinging foam-padded weapons at 300-1000 of my
closest friends ;)

Talies the Wanderer
